level.heading: REGISTRATION OF INDIVIDUAL APPRENTICESHIP AGREEMENTS REQUIRED (ยง 7-1106)

level.text: No apprentice shall be employed under a registered apprenticeship program unless an individual apprenticeship agreement for that apprentice has been registered with the Director.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6005(September 14, 1990).
